trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script:
SetVar("AutoSaveCount", 0) SetVar("UFOCounterStarted", 0)
if GAME_VERSION then SetVar("ISLVersion", GAME_VERSION) end
PlayCustomMusic("Battle01")
CreateNewDummyObject( "r2_crag_copped_3", "cragTR", -1, -1, CVector(1255, 420, 1591), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.1951, 0.0000, 0.9808), 0)
TActivate("TRIGGER_ALIENSDIE")
local bossp = GetEntityByName("AliensShip") if bossp then bossp:NextState() ShowBossIndicator(bossp:GetId()) end
AllowSave(false)
TActivate("trAutoSave")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trAutoSave
trigger.script:
if GetVar("AutoSaveCount").AsInt == 0 then SetVar("AutoSaveCount", 3) AutoSave(STR_BOSS_NJERI) -- перед битвой с Ньери elseif GetVar("AutoSaveCount").AsInt == 3 then SetVar("AutoSaveCount", 1) PlayCustomMusic("Battle01") -- чтобы играла музыка боя после загрузки автосейва AllowSave(false) end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: VyborFinala
trigger.script:
local ending = DefineTheEnding()
if ending==1 then TakeQuest("BenGoodEnd") elseif ending==0 then TakeQuest("BenNormalEnd") else println("CRITICAL! CAN NOT DEFINE THE ENDING!") LOG("CRITICAL! CAN NOT DEFINE THE ENDING!") end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: ToR2M1AfterBoss
trigger.script:
local b = SpawnMessageBox("8808") if b == 1 then PassToMap("r1m2", "FromR1M3", -1, true) else PassToMap("r2m1", "AfterDistantNjeriBattle_loc", -1, true) end
trigger:Deactivate()
